bill_title: revise certain provisions related to the calculation of school and public lands funds and county general school funds.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to revise certain provisions related to the calculation of school and public lands funds and county general school funds. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 13-13-5 be amended to read as follows: 13-13-5. The county treasurer shall on or before the fifth day of January and July furnish the county auditor with a statement of all money in the county treasury belonging to the county general school fund and shall pay the money, upon the order of the auditor to the public school districts having land area within the county in proportion to the average daily membership of children residing fall enrollment, as defined by § 13-13-10.1, in the school districts as certified by the Division of Education Services and Resources plus the nonpublic fall enrollment as defined by § 13-37-35.1 . Section 2. That § 13-13-1.1 be amended to read as follows: 13-13-1.1. The individual school district average daily membership as calculated by the Division of Education Services and Resources fall enrollment for distribution of school and public lands funds may not include pupils for whom the public school receives tuition, shall include pupils for whom the district pays tuition, and shall include resident pupils attending private schools shall be the fall enrollment, as defined by § 13-13-10.1, in the school district plus the nonpublic fall enrollment, as defined by § 13-37-35.1 .
